text: Community centres or community halls are public locations where members of a community gather for group activities, social support, public information, and other purposes. They may sometimes be open for the whole community or for a specific group within the greater community. Community centres can be religious in nature, such as Christian, Islamic, or Jewish community centres, or can be secular, such as youth clubs.ln Africa, they are public places where people gather or collect themselves for support, information, function or any given purpose ==References== Category:Public services
title: Community centre
